description: [``botocore``] Update InputTransformer variable limit from 10 to 100 variables.
[``botocore``] Block endpoint resolution of clients configured with S3 pseudo-regions (e.g. ``aws-global``, ``s3-external-1``) that will never resolve to a correct access point endpoint.

[``botocore``] This release of the Amazon Macie API adds support for defining run-time, S3 bucket criteria for classification jobs. It also adds resources for querying data about AWS resources that Macie monitors.
[``botocore``] Updated descriptions to add notes on array lengths.
[``botocore``] Updated descriptions of array parameters to add the restrictions on the array and value lengths.
[``botocore``] Transcribe Medical now supports identification of PHI entities within transcripts
[``botocore``] Text-only updates for bundled documentation feedback tickets - spring 2021.
[``botocore``] Add validation to only attempt to connect to FIPS endpoints with a FIPS pseudo-region if the pseudo-region is explicitly known to the SDK.
